title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Snoring Murder
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A chronic snorer is suffocated with a pillow by a sleep-deprived roommate who has been pushed past their breaking point after days without rest.

death_teaser: Some noises you learn to live with. Some you die from.
